name: Sketchy Diamond Tee (Prarie Dust)
description: Check it! This tee has two diamonds printed on the collar bone area! It is limited to 40 and comes in 3 colour ways, this particular colour way is prarie dust! Check out the pizza box packaging aswell, silver ink on a white box with contents list and edition number! Free stickers and badges tucked inside the box also, any maybe some extra suprises if you are lucky! Shipping is inclusive in the price of this product! name: Diamond Argyle Tote
description: Yessssss, one for the ladies! Or even a man bag if you like! The diamond argyle print in black and white on a 100% natural cotton tote! Match your boy in his tee or just look stylish on your own! This easily fits in your school books/folders, 12” croosh vinyl etc! The straps are big enough to fit over your shoulder aswell! All prices include postage costs and every item comes with free badges and stickers! Click the link below for a larger image; Click for large image! name: Hand Made Tweed Purse
description: Quite possibly the best item we have made so far? These purses are handmade from a lovely grey and black herringbone type tweed fabric! They are lined with a sky blue cotton material and have a felt diamond hand stitched on the front! There is plenty of room for your credit cards / i.d / roll of money! Perfect for when you go out to the disco! All prices include postage costs and every item comes with free badges and stickers! Click the link below for a larger image; Click for large image! Click the link below for a size chart; Click for a size chart These where constructed by the most excellent i love apples so head over to her site by clicking on the link above and check it out!
